metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass the arm-ttk test, 'Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded'. Instead the `workspace-location` derived from the log analytics workspace is used.
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is configured
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is configured
the log analytics workspace enabled for Microsoft Sentinel
The display name for the solution package.
The title displayed in the connector UI.
Content ID for the data connector definition.
Content ID for the data connector connections.
Name for the Data Collection Rule (DCR).
Unique name for the data connector instance.
The name of the custom Log Analytics table to store the data.

dataFlows.transformKql: source | extend TimeGenerated = datetime(1970-01-01) + timestamp * 1sec | extend app_sessionid = tostring(app_session_id), connectionid = tostring(connection_id), dlp_incidentid = tostring(dlp_incident_id), dlp_parentid = tostring(dlp_parent_id), latest_incidentid = tostring(latest_incident_id) | project-rename title_s = ['title'] | project-away _id

connectorUiConfig.title: [parameters('solutionTitle')]
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: This is an example of data connector

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

customs.name: Netskope v2 alerts URL and API key
customs.description: Netskope v2 API requires an API key to authenticate

instructionSteps.description: To enable the Netskope Alerts v2 connector to Microsoft Sentinel, provide the required information below and click on Connect.
instructionSteps.title: Connect to Netskope Alerts v2 endpoint to start collecting event logs to Microsoft Sentinel
